greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest m in range 1..phi(n) such that 7^m == 1 mod n, or 0 if no such number exists.
link: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Table[SelectFirst[Range[EulerPhi[n]],PowerMod[7,#,n]==1&],{n,80}]/.(Missing["NotFound"]->0) (* Requires Mathematica version 10 or later *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Jan 25 2019 *)
program: (MAGMA) [0] cat [Modorder(7, n): n in [2..100]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Apr 01 2014
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_ and _Amarnath Murthy_, May 08 2002
